name: @wartoshika/wow-qhun-core-ts
description: A Framework written in Typescript for World of Warcraft Addons

scripts.tree: ./node_modules/.bin/npm-run-all dependency-all dependency-core dependency-locale dependency-model dependency-net dependency-ui dependency-database dependency-slash
scripts.dependency-all: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/overall.svg
scripts.dependency-core: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/core | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/core.svg
scripts.dependency-locale: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/locale | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/locale.svg
scripts.dependency-model: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/model | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/model.svg
scripts.dependency-net: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/net | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/net.svg
scripts.dependency-ui: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/ui | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/ui.svg
scripts.dependency-database: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/database | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/database.svg
scripts.dependency-slash: ./node_modules/.bin/dependency-cruise -x node_modules -x "index.ts" --ts-pre-compilation-deps -T dot src/slash | dot -T svg > dependency_visual/slash.svg

author: wartoshika <dev@qhun.de>
